name: Welcome Home Transitional Housing
description: Short-term housing for justice-involved individuals reentering society. Offers case management and referrals.
notes: Prioritizes applicants recently released from incarceration.

name: Peace of Mind TN
description: Provides trauma-informed counseling and peer recovery services for individuals in early recovery or post-release.
notes: Offers virtual sessions and accepts most insurance plans. Sliding scale available.

name: Program Name
description: What does this resource do and who does it serve?
